title: EOS Credit
description: EOS Credit is a mobile application designed to provide convenient and secure lending services to individuals seeking financial assistance.

title: Smart Cradle
description: This was my final project for my undergraduate studies. The Smart Cradle Project is a development of a series of software and hardware sharing and interacting information with each other to provide a solution to assist parents to monitor and take care of their babies.

title: TaiKi Collection
description: This is my personal composing work. The theme of the work is an epic chinese adventure orchestra music collection.
